name: A Memory (itch)
description:
If you are here for the normal Bitsy shit posting I tend to go for, this aint it. 

I muse on missing my Christmas dinners back when I was  kid.  I had to stop a few times to wipe tears out of my eyes, and there is a chance you might have to too.  

Never did I think I would make serious personal Bitsy, or it be 100% vanilla but  here we are.

I dedicate this the my Grandmother who passed away towards the end of last September of several pre-existing conditions.  She had a good, long, life.



Made for the Candle Jam. 

Adam Le Doux - For making Bitsy
